favourite.article: Each time! Each time to You, Lord. Each morning. Each time, may we taste Your newness and freshness. Each morning, turn our hearts to You. Grant us Your presence. Then later, refresh us! Again and again, throughout each day. Come to us, draw us back to You. Remind us! Over and over, day after day. Bother us, Lord, with Your desire for us! Delight us by reminding us of Yourself, the most precious One to us. Break through every preoccupation, every distraction, by being the greater, greatest Attraction. We love You and give ourselves to You again today, Lord.
Draw me to run after You and let Him kiss me with the kisses of his mouth....for Your love is better than wine!
Thank You Jesus, You are my joy both now and forever!
I want You Lord to be the first One in me as I wake in the morning.
Lord!!! My cup runneth over with joy!
